attributes.action: Honour Britain's foremost Shakespearean actor, Chuffer Dandridge, with a knighthood.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Chuffer Dandridge, one of Britain's greatest actors (or so he says..) is a regular contributor to the Radio Two morning show of Sir Terry Wogan. For services to the country, the good cheer he dispenses and the incomparable humour of his contributions I feel he should be honoured. If Sir Terry got a 'gong', surely Chuffer Dandridge also merits one...

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
